723815f-a.text:
Walker Street, west side, north from Broadway.
Penruary 20, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.

717253f-a.text:
400-402-404-406 Broadway 107 on Broadway 100 feet on Walker Street. Plot 11,000 square feet. Sold by Brown, Wheelock, Harris, Stevens. Inc. to Charles F. Noyes for all cash. Assessed $280,000. 15 is stated that Mr. N yes will erect new buildings at 402-4-6 Broadway for individual occupancy. The corner, a film building, will be remodeled.

Bought by Noyes from Barbey Estate
Row of all four buildings at 400 to 406 Broadway, corner of Walker Street, which he bought with fourteen various other properties for his personal account and for permanent investment. "There is more money in real estate than in anything else" Noyes said in explaining the purchase, which was arranged by Brown. Wheelock, Harris, Stevens, Inc.

Jul. 19, 1936
